The whole history of the idea.

Everything started from 9 bucks.
And an extraordinary idea.

We...well, I, made this website. At first, I just thought buying the [School Name].com was a really interesting idea, and having an experimental spirit is essential for me. So I purchased the domain with 9 bucks. Then, I developed everything and everything evolved many time...

3/26/2023

9/3/2023

11/3/2023

Now

Register of tswgss.com

A simple idea, with a balance in my PayPal account, tswgss.com was bought by an ordinary student in the school TSWGSS. Nothing else, simply this is an extraordinary and fun action to improve myself, and earning experience. At first, tswgss.com website was just a placeholder website with redirection for people who mistyped the school domain.

Establishment of the TSWGSS public secrets

Observing the market, and seeing what's lacking, is the first step of marketing. I own the domain of tswgss.com and there's no public school secrets account on Instagram by that time. Therefore, I asked myself, why not take the advantage of this opportunity?

Website & idea evolution / redevelopment.

Due to the lack of engagement of the public school secrets. I realized I must withdraw the idea and reposition to maintain the whole thing. Hence, I made the website more diverse, the most important change is the tools function. The platform should not rely on secrets because nobody is providing them.

Establishment of "TswgssWeb"

Every time I thought I reached the limit, I always broke the limit. In the first place, I thought the redeveloped website was perfect, nothing had to change. However, after a while, I realized, this was not enough. So, I branded the website, basically remaking everything and starting to make the whole thing modern and not useless.

We're the one agency that created this website.

SimpleWebs Web Development
Agency (SWDA)

SimpleWebs is a web development agency that helps its clients to get a whole website for themselves with quality and efficiency. Additionally, sells its pre-built functional websites in its marketplace. Clients are expected to have a whole functioning website after using our service. Including web domain, hosting, and development, we'll do everything for you after payment. Get yourself a piece of place on the internet!
